verses.verse: The words<WH1697> of Amos,<WH5986> who<WH834> was among the herdsmen<WH5349> of Tekoa,<WH8620> which<WH834> he saw<WH2372> concerning<WH5921> Israel<WH3478> in the days<WH3117> of Uzziah<WH5818> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and in the days<WH3117> of Jeroboam<WH3379> the son<WH1121> of Joash<WH3101> king<WH4428> of Israel,<WH3478> two years<WH8141> before<WH6440> the earthquake.<WH7494>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> For three<WH7969> transgressions<WH6588> of Damascus,<WH1834> and for four,<WH702> I will not turn<WH7725> away the punishment thereof; because<WH5921> they have threshed<WH1758> Gilead<WH1568> with threshing<WH2742> instruments of iron:<WH1270>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> For three<WH7969> transgressions<WH6588> of Gaza,<WH5804> and for four,<WH702> I will not turn<WH7725> away the punishment thereof; because<WH5921> they carried<WH1540> away captive<WH1540> the whole<WH8003> captivity,<WH1546> to deliver<WH5462> them up to Edom:<WH123>

Thus said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> For three<WH7969> transgressions<WH6588> of Tyrus,<WH6865> and for four,<WH702> I will not turn<WH7725> away the punishment thereof; because<WH5921> they delivered<WH5462> up the whole<WH8003> captivity<WH1546> to Edom,<WH123> and remembered<WH2142> not the brotherly<WH251> covenant:<WH1285>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> For three<WH7969> transgressions<WH6588> of Edom,<WH123> and for four,<WH702> I will not turn<WH7725> away the punishment thereof; because<WH5921> he did pursue<WH7291> his brother<WH251> with the sword,<WH2719> and did cast<WH7843> off all pity,<WH7356> and his anger<WH639> did tear<WH2963> perpetually,<WH5703> and he kept<WH8104> his wrath<WH5678> for ever:<WH5331>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> For three<WH7969> transgressions<WH6588> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and for four,<WH702> I will not turn<WH7725> away the punishment thereof; because<WH5921> they have ripped<WH1234> up the women with child<WH2030> of Gilead,<WH1568> that they might enlarge<WH7337> their border:<WH1366>
